content: A sample of the [Christmas cards for this year](https://qubyte.codes/blog/procedural-christmas-cards-2022). They were rushed, and certainly minimalist, but Iâ€™m happy with the result.

photo.alt: A hand made Christmas card standing on a table in a cafe, next to a cup of coffee. The card is white, with a blue panel on the front. On top of the panel is a snow man cut from white card with a specular snow shine to it.
